techs.name: Plasma Scoring
techs.text: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

techs.name: Neural Motivator
techs.text: During the status phase, draw 2 action cards instead of 1.

techs.name: Antimass Deflectors
techs.text:
Your ships can move into and through asteroid fields.
When other players' units use SPACE CANNON against your units apply -1 to the result of each die roll.

techs.name: Sarween Tools
techs.text: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

techs.name: Magen Defense Grid
techs.text: You may exhaust this card at the start of a round of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your units that have PLANETARY SHIELD; your opponent cannot make combat rolls during this combat round.

techs.name: Dacxive Animators
techs.text: After you win a ground combat, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

techs.name: Gravity Drive
techs.text: After you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action.

techs.name: Graviton Laser System
techs.text: You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

techs.name: Duranium Armor
techs.text: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units repair 1 of your damaged units that did not use SUSTAIN DAMAGE during this combat round.

techs.name: Hyper Metabolism
techs.text: During the status phase gain 2 command tokens instead of 1.

techs.name: Fleet Logistics
techs.text: During each of your turns of the action phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1.

techs.name: Transit Diodes
techs.text: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

techs.name: Assault Cannon
techs.text: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more of your non-fighter ships, your opponent must destroy 1 of his non-fighter ships.

techs.name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
techs.text: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose 1 planet in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships that have BOMBARDMENT; destroy all infantry on that planet.

techs.name: Light/Wave Deflector
techs.text: Your ships can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

techs.name: Integrated Economy
techs.text: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet that have a combined cost equal to or less than that planet's resource value.

techs.name: Neuroglaive
techs.text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from his fleet pool and returns it to his reinforcements.

techs.name: Salvage Operations
techs.text: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade goog; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship in the system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat.

techs.name: Mirror Computing
techs.text: When you spend trade goods each trade good is worth 2 resources or influence instead of 1.

techs.name: Chaos Mapping
techs.text:
Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships.
At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has PRODUCTION.

techs.name: Valefar Assimilator X
techs.text: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 or your faction abilities you may place the "X" assimilator tiken on a faction technology owned by that faction instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

techs.name: Valefar Assimilator Y
techs.text: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 or your faction abilities you may place the "Y" assimilator tiken on a faction technology owned by that faction instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

techs.name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
techs.text: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

techs.name: Magmus Reactor
techs.text:
Your ships can move into supernovas.
After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good.

techs.name: Spacial Conduit Cylinder
techs.text: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation.

techs.name: E-Res Siphons
techs.text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods.

techs.name: Lazax Gate Folding
techs.text:
During your tactical action, if you don not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and beta wormhole.
ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

techs.name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
techs.text: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control until the end of your turn.

techs.name: l4 Disruptors
techs.text: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

techs.name: Non-Euclidian Shielding
techs.text: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

techs.name: Dimensional Splicer
techs.text: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

techs.name: Wormhole Generator
techs.text: At the start of the status phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that containsa a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

techs.name: Transparasteel Plating
techs.text: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

techs.name: Mageon Implants
techs.text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards.  Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

techs.name: Bioplasmosis
techs.text: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

techs.name: Impulse Core
techs.text: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of his non-fighter ships if able.

techs.name: Yin Spinner
techs.text: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet that you control in that system.

techs.name: Inheritance Systems
techs.text: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology; ignore all of that technologie's prerequisistes.

techs.name: Nullification Field
techs.text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

techs.name: Instinct Training
techs.text: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays and action card; cancel that action card.

techs.name: Quantum Datahub Node
techs.text: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 toke from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods.  If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of his strategy cards.

techs.name: Production Biomes
techs.text: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.
